descriptions.short_description: Leading Sydney medical negligence lawyers with 25+ years experience securing compensation for victims of medical malpractice.
descriptions.description: Full detailed description of the firm, their approach, why clients should choose them, their values, and commitment to medical negligence cases. Should be 200-400 words.

accreditations: Law Society of NSW Accredited Specialist - Personal Injury

team_members.bio: Former medical practitioner turned lawyer with unique insight into medical negligence cases.
Specializes in birth injury cases with a compassionate, client-focused approach.

qualifications.institution: Supreme Court of New South Wales

case_studies.title: Major Birth Injury Settlement - Cerebral Palsy Case
case_studies.summary: Successfully secured $2.75 million for a family whose child developed cerebral palsy due to delayed emergency caesarean section.
case_studies.outcome: Settlement achieved after expert medical evidence proved hospital's failure to monitor fetal distress led to permanent brain injury.

faqs.question: Do I have to pay upfront fees?
faqs.answer: No, we work on a no-win, no-fee basis for medical negligence cases. You only pay if we successfully secure compensation for you.

faqs.question: How long do I have to make a medical negligence claim in NSW?
faqs.answer: Generally, you have 3 years from when you became aware (or should have become aware) of the negligence. However, exceptions apply, so contact us immediately for a free assessment.

faqs.question: What types of medical negligence cases do you handle?
faqs.answer: We handle all types of medical negligence including surgical errors, misdiagnosis, delayed diagnosis, birth injuries, medication errors, hospital negligence, and nursing home abuse.

seo.meta_title: Medical Negligence Lawyers Sydney | No Win No Fee | Smith Med Law
